text: ql -ayha alrswl- lajamie alnas: bifadl allah wbrhmth, wahu ma ja'ahum min allah min alhudaa wadin alhaqi wahu al'islam, fbdhlk flyfrhu; fa'iina al'islam aldhy deahm allah 'ilyh, walquran aldhy 'anzalah ealaa muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm, khayr mimaa yajmaeun min hutam aldunya wama fiha min alzhrt alfanyt aldhahbt
